thread.title: New Doctor Who trailer teases Series 10
thread.title_full: New Doctor Who trailer teases Series 10

author: Daniel Jackson
title: New Doctor Who trailer teases Series 10
text:
New Doctor Who trailer teases Series 10 Peter Capaldi's final series as The Doctor was teased on social media Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Doctor Who is back with an exciting new teaser trailer Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
The BBC released a new trailer for the new series of Doctor Who today. 
Previewing the tenth series since its revival, the new teaser showed Capaldi's Doctor marching through an exploding corridor with Matt Lucas ' character Nardole and new companion Bill, played by Pearl Mackie . MEET PEARL MACKIE (Photo: BBC) 
The 30 second trailer, released on Twitter with the hashtag #timeforheroes, ends with a brief glimpse of enemies that will feature in upcoming episodes - including the return of the Ice Warriors. Frames of the trailer also show Daleks and Cybermen villains could also be returning. Doctor Who (Photo: BBC) 
This series will Peter Capaldi 's last as the Time Lord after he confirmed last month he will step down from playing The Doctor. Although the new series could see him exit with a bang as the trailer calls his Doctor 'the most dangerous man in the universe'. 
Steven Moffat will also be stepping aside as showrunner, being replaced by Broadchurch creator Chris Chibnall. Read More Who will take over from Peter Capaldi in Doctor Who? Miss Quill (Photo: BBC) 
The new trailer comes just a day after Doctor Who spin-off show Class was cancelled. The BBC 3 series lasted just 8 episodes. Read More 
Doctor Who returns on Saturday April 15 on BBC One. Like us on Facebook
